inclusion.criterion: First diagnosis of hypothyroidism due to Hashimoto's thyroiditis (high levels of serum antithyroid autoantibodies (antiTPO, anti-TgAb)).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For Controls: Healthy individuals 5 to 18 years old.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: BMI for age between 15th and 85th percentile (z-score between -1 and +1).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: For patients Presence of euthyroidsm, subclinical hypothyroidism, hyperthyroidism.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing medical treatment for clinical hypothyroidism.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Taking other medications (eg growth hormone, corticosteroids) in the last 3 months.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Taking food supplements (eg omega-3 fatty acids, amino acids) in the last 3 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant endocrine, metabolic, degenerative and / or chronic diseases other than obesity (eg diabetes, hyper / hypo-cortisolemia, cardiovascular diseases, kidney diseases, myasthenia, neurological diseases, psychiatric disorders eg anorexia nervosa, cancer, anemia, celiac disease, chromosomal abnormalities eg syndrome Turner, Down, etc).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in any daily organized physical activity (sport), more than 1 hour per day.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of menstrual disorders in adolescent girls.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Having any kind of nutrition/dietary intervention (eg weight loss diet, hypocaloric, ketogenic, low-protein diet), in the last 6 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and is on Levothyroxine. She has a high BMI but no other exclusion criteria mentioned.
